analysis.core_thesis: A multi-layered trend-following strategy combining ADX momentum and volatility squeeze signals with advanced risk management
entry_conditions: Multiple entry scenarios: standalone, add-on, and reversal
analysis.position_sizing: R-based position sizing: Automatically calculates position size based on stop distance and predefined risk percentage (0.5% default)

indicator_roles.ATR Stop Module: Adaptive stop loss based on volatility regimes

risk_percent.purpose: Percentage of equity risked per trade, determines position sizing

adx_threshold.purpose: Minimum ADX strength to consider a trend valid

long_max_risk.purpose: Maximum initial risk factor for long positions

short_max_risk.purpose: Maximum initial risk factor for short positions

initial_stop_multiplier.purpose: Adjust initial stop distance for fine-tuning entry risk
